snippet.title: The Sims 4 Extreme Violence "MOD" Beta V 1.2
snippet.description:
SIMS HAVE GONE VIOLENT!
A set of violent interactions that will unleash Your sims inner rage!
Or maybe calm them down by Twerking???

Mod download link + Full description of the mod :
http://sims4studio.com/post/76154/thread

to install the mod , extract the files from the  ".RAR Or .Zip File" &  Put the files in :
 "C:\Users\*YOUR USERNAME*\Documents\Electronic Arts\The Sims 4\Mods" 

Song that plays at the end when the man gets shot : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J9TE50uuxlI&ab_channel=Marcom%C3%A9Marcome

Enjoy!
